greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lower limit of backward value of 2^n and n!.
comment: For n!, omitting the trailing sequence zeros. - _Simon Plouffe_, Mar 05 2017
The terms are deduced from sequence A023415.
The sum of constants in A158624 and A158625 is conjectured to be 11 exactly.
program: # lower limit of backward value of 2^n
